title: BIC Velocity Retractable Ballpoint Pens, Medium Point (1.0 mm), Black Ink, 36-Count Pack - BIC
text: BIC Velocity Retractable Ballpoint Pens, Medium Point (1.0 mm), Black Ink 36-Count In stock Description The trusted original with a classic look and feel, BIC Velocity Retractable Ball Pens offer fluid, effortless writing for everyday writing tasks. The Velocity is BIC's #1 selling retractable ball pen and comes filled with ink that writes even smoother than BIC classic ink system. Each pen features a rubber grip that offers a comfortable hold-ideal for longer writing sessions-and a 1.0mm medium point that is versatile enough for a variety of writing activities. - One 36-count pack of BIC Velocity Retractable Black Pens - Ballpoint pen with a 1.0 mm ballpoint creates striking lines for easy writing and reading - BIC pens Easy-Glide System offers a smooth writing experience - Rubber grip for comfort - Medium-point with black ink to deliver dark lines Characteristics Reviews
